name: Star Destroyer (itch) (AydanG, karataskn20)
description:
Description

Star Destroy is yet another space shooter game made for Kenney Jam 2022. If you get hit, you grow. Well, in size actually.

Feel free to comment any tips bugs you see!

Controls

WASD - Moving the Ship

Left Mouse Button - Shooting

Planned Features

SFX and Music

High Score

Upgrades and Different Attack Patterns

Exit Button :P

Credits

AydanG and karataskn20 - Everything

Kenney Assets Used

Planets, Space Shooter Redux and Alien UFO Pack
